survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction with the collaboration tools provided by the company, to identify areas for improvement and ensure optimal productivity.

questions.question_text: Which collaboration tools do you frequently use for work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection to capture all tools in use.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option for open-ended input.

script.question_text: Which collaboration tools do you frequently use for work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of the collaboration tools you use?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one tool in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of the collaboration tools you use?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one tool in Q1.

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when using these collaboration tools?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific pain points.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when using these collaboration tools?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q2.

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with these tools (e.g., crashes, slow performance)?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to identify common technical issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with these tools (e.g., crashes, slow performance)?

questions.question_text: What additional collaboration tools or features would you like to see implemented?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional collaboration tools or features would you like to see implemented?
